price: ߣߌ߫ ߒ ߞߵߏ߬ ߟߊߞߢߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ ߒ ߠߊ߫ ߣߌ ߘߏ߫ ߝߍ߫ ߊ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߦߴߊߟߎ߫ ߓߋ߬ ߊ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߕߌ߲ߓߌߘߌ߲ ߘߌ߫
arabic: فَإِذَا سَوَّيۡتُهُۥ وَنَفَخۡتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِي فَقَعُواْ لَهُۥ سَٰجِدِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā sawwaytuhu wanafakhtu fīhi min rūḥī faqaʿū lahu sājidīna
